attributes.action: Stop the ban on XL Bullies
attributes.additional_details: Not all bullies are vicious,  owners  who rear them right will not have any issues, I’ve always had staffs, pit bulls and bullies. Never has my dog had issues attacking pets or human friends. Harsher penalties for owners of bullies who attack… all bullies what are handed in to rescue centres are to be put down… with cost of living people can’t afford what government are asking… please sign and get our voice heard… thanks in advance
attributes.background: Government is banning the XL breed bullies, unfair and unjust

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
